content:
Rounding out our ballot reconciliation sequence: we'll plan to tackle the remaining ballot issues in the 2nd hour of today's FHIR Infrastructure call -- https://hl7-org.zoom.us/j/8583747934?pwd=VnZiWFZsNm1TSk5QWmZlbVJyQVZGdz09 (see you in 53 min) :-)

If you want to review the topics:

  • https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179170-smart/topic/Resolving.20FHIR-32210
  • https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179170-smart/topic/Resolving.20FHIR-32251
